Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice:
 
Malice charged forward, parried the minion's strike and sliced his side with the katanna, then smacked him in the back with the flat side of Verte- Breaker.  He slowed and stopped, pulled his disruptor rifle, and fired a few shots into the back of the minion Night Strike.  He spotted an energon deposit, stuck the katanna tip into it, and in full view of the public, began absorbing the energy from the deposit.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Nightstrike:

Night strike dodged some Malice's blow's and quick he check his 
wounds. Mechfluid drop was falling from his mouth, "I'm just 
starting"hissed while he took his sword and ran toward Malice and 
did a strike with his weapon


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> The minion stabbed Malice in the chest with an energon blade.  It 
hurt alot, and so Malice punched Night Strike in the face a few 
times, the stabbed him in the chest with his katanna.  He took a 
step back and looked at his chest.  He smirked, and absorbed the 
energon out of the knife, dropped it to the ground, and focused on 
healing the wound.  Thanks to the Transmetal 2 body, it heal quickly 
and then Malice approached Night strike, this time with both his 
katanna and the Verte- Breaker sword.
> "Is that all you got?  Some servant of Unicron!"
